Container.Name: db-backup
Container.Overview: Backup multiple database types on a scheduled basis with many customizable options. Manual Backups can be performed by entering the container and typing backup-now For diffrent port please add variable DB1_PORT and include the port For more DB backups you can include DB2_NAME etc https://github.com/tiredofit/docker-db-backup#job-backup-options Check advanced for more settings

Config.Name: DB01_NAME
Config.Description: Schema Name e.g. database or ALL to backup all databases the user has access to.

Config.Name: DB01_TYPE
Config.Description: Type of DB Server to backup couch influx mysql mssql pgsql mongo redis sqlite3

Config.Name: DB01_HOST
Config.Description: Server Hostname e.g. mariadb. For sqlite3, full path to DB file e.g. /backup/db.sqlite3

Config.Name: DB01_USER
Config.Description: username for the database(s) - Can use root for MySQL

Config.Name: DB01_PASS
Config.Description: (optional if DB doesn't require it) password for the database

Config.Name: DB01_SPLIT_DB
Config.Description: If using ALL - use this to split each database into its own file as opposed to one singular file

Config.Name: DEFAULT_BACKUP_INTERVAL
Config.Description: How often to dump DB Minutes Defaults 1440 = Day

Config.Name: DEFAULT_CLEANUP_TIME
Config.Description: Value in minutes to delete old backups. 10080 = One Week. If you want all backup delete this key.

Config.Name: DEFAULT_COMPRESSION
Config.Description: Use either Gzip GZ, Bzip2 BZ, XZip XZ, ZSTD ZSTD or none NONE

Config.Name: DEFAULT_COMPRESSION_LEVEL
Config.Description: Numerical value of what level of compression to use, most allow 1 to 9, except for ZSTD which allows for 1 to 19

Config.Name: DEFAULT_GZ_RSYNCABLE
Config.Description: Use --rsyncable (gzip only) for faster rsync transfers and incremental backup deduplication.

Config.Name: DEFAULT_FILESYSTEM_PATH_PERMISSION
Config.Description: Permissions to apply to backup directory

Config.Name: DEFAULT_ENABLE_PARALLEL_COMPRESSION
Config.Description: Use multiple cores when compressing backups TRUE or FALSE

Config.Name: DEFAULT_PARALLEL_COMPRESSION_THREADS
Config.Description: Maximum amount of threads to use when compressing - Integer value e.g. 8

Config.Name: USER_DBBACKUP
Config.Description: The uid that the image should read and write files as (username is dbbackup)

Config.Name: GROUP_DBBACKUP
Config.Description: The gid that the image should read and write files as (groupname is dbbackup)

Config.Name: DEFAULT_CHECKSUM
Config.Description: Either MD5 or SHA1 or NONE
